title: Can Australian plantation forest carbon offset methods increase carbon storage and timber supply? A case study from the Green Triangle plantation forestry region in Australia
content:

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 370

Author(s): Courtney M. Regan, Jeffery D. Connor, David M. Summers, Will Mackay, Yuan Gao
